Didn't like it at all at first, but it's growing on me.

You just find a daw and start. I've been a producing for a while now, and you just have to start, otherwise you'll keep wondering where to start instead of starting. You can dm me if you have specific questions. I use FL Studio 12.
I knew he was at their show last night, but I wasn't expecting this.

I was selected to read a poem for the Christmas concert at our school. During the rehearsal (not the performance, thank god), I was supposed to say "his clothes were all tarnished with ashes a soot," but it came out as "his clothes were tarnished with asses and soot".
